message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product for $9,500. I know you'll find it valuable.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand where you're coming from, but $7,500 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $8,750?

I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,200? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing the product if we can come to an agreement.
